features: 【Attention Size】Please check your stove size to ensure it matches this item. Please pay attention to the size. the stove covers may not fit your stove perfectly. So, you may require some cutting on your own. After-sale guarantee the stove protectors didn't fit your stove, just let us know first you ！！！

【Keep the Cooktop Clean】the stove cover is made of high-quality, prevents scalding and stains, so that the cooktop is protected from spilled or splashed stains and grease, which effectively protects your cooktop. You can say goodbye to those stains and keep the stove clean.

【Heat Resistance Stove Protector】The stove top covers for Samsung Gas Range Stove Mat can work continuously at a temperature lower than 570°C/1050°F without melting, burning, or deforming, which is suitable for Gas Rang. The thickness of 0.4mm is thicker and can be outstanding. Withstand high temperatures. Tips: Take care to avoid direct contact with fire!

【Saves the Time】the surface of the stove burner covers is non-sticky, which can quickly dispose of oil and other residues to keep the cooker clean and hygienic. The protective oven pad is simple to wash, can be taken out directly to scrub with water, and can also be placed in the dishwasher for washing, which considerably saves the time for cleaning the stove. When this protector is deployed, it is instantly erased. No grease, crumbs or muck remained.

【Perfect Size】You can also use scissors to cut to the size you want before use!! The gas stove liners are completely compatible with gas stoves and the precise perforations are integrated with the stovetop. The oven protector is simple to install, just pull it out of your package and lay it on the stove. For 2 pack oven gap cover, easy to trim with a household scissor, you can customize based on the unique fit of your stove and counter.

for Samsung Gas Stove Protector It has soft and flexible silicone that conforms perfectly to the stove and counter surface, even if they are inconsistent. And the oven gap covers can easily rip to fit non-standard size for the thicker place. Please calculate the size of your counter gap before buying. The silicone gap filler is simple to wash with a damp cloth or scrub in the dishwasher.. Our kitchen is flawless. Please stay as far away as possible from open flames.

Dustproof and avoid spillage The Samsung gas stove cover has high-quality high-temperature resistance and does not melt, deform, or generate any odor during frequent cooking. The gas range cover is the perfect combination for your routine cooking. You just need to make sure the gas stove top covers fit your Samsung gas stove. You can install it quickly. Easy to cut stove gas range cover Our oven gap cover has an anti-static function, so the dust that adheres to it can be easily scrubbed away. It is also very stable, so it is not prone to creases. The oven gap covers enhanced design to make the premium quality smooth top surface, good dustproof performance and the glossy back surface is non-slip. Dishwasher Safe: The oven gap cover is dishwasher safe. They are flexible and can be easily removed and tossed in the dishwasher. The high-quality heat-resistant silicone withstands heat dry cycles in the dishwasher without any degradation. Keep your stove top clean and look fresh.

High Temperature Resistance If the gas stovetop cover is unexpectedly soiled in daily use, just wipe it with a towel. When it is too dirty, You can scrub it with soap in the sink or put it in the dishwasher. gas range stovetop burner protectors are resistant to high temperatures up to 570° Fahrenheit and will not melt, burn or deform. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If it doesn't fit - it might be upside down!
reviews.reviewText: I got this fast (thank you) and unrolled it and put it on. Disappointment! It did not fit right and one of the burners was too small. It took me about an hour of doing something else and it hit me - upside down. Both sides look the same - it fits perfect. Unwrapped the side pieces the next day and yep, they go on the sides perfectly to fill in the slight gap between stove and countertop. Not planning to use the cute metal brushes on the stove, but I am sure they will come in handy for something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Size Description incorrect…Waste!
reviews.reviewText: Prior to purchasing this item I made sure to measure my stove and it was a match to the product size description. When I got the order the stove cover did not fit at all. I had to cut a HUGE chunk in order for the cover to fit. Also, cutting the edges along with tapping it down. Why the tape? The covers keep lifting from the sides and does not stay in place.The quality is the worst. I thought the quality would be more like a flammable paper or plastic, but this is a thick paper that will burn if it comes near the fire.Why even sell this? Why?My advice to all find something better, durable, better quality, safe, and do not waste your money with this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how these help keep my stove clean. I only wish we had a little more control assistance in cutting the mats for the different sized burners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect, no adjustment necessary!
reviews.reviewText: This arrived right on time, not only is it easy to clean, but it’s easier then my stove top for cleaning the crumbs off which are always such a pain to clean on this type of stove. Without the cover, every little watermark shows, and I have to lift up all the grates just get two crumbs cleaned. I think those of you who clean these stoves daily know what I’m talking about with the water spots and everything, this stove cover is perfect, the texture is so easy to clean with no spots. The price was very reasonable and I wholeheartedly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars keeps the stove clean.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered for GE Cafe gas stove. The product did not fit perfect round the burners. It slides. I do love the side guards that keep food from dropping between the stove and counter top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product fits good and keeps my stove really clean. Just remove and wipe off and put back really easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Had to cut it to more than I cared to…
reviews.reviewText: item stated it would fit my LG stove and it did not. Instead of returning it I thought I would trim it. I had to cut more than I cared to in order to make it work. If you look at the picture the side that you don’t see the edge is where I cut the most. The notches that you see I did cut but they were useless. It is a bit buckled, hopefully it will flatten or I just wasted my money. Tbh I wish I should have bought the more expensive brand, I was trying to save a few bucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: it's a must have for gas stove
reviews.reviewText: It's actually a bit smaller than the inside surface of my Samsung gas stove, but as a general cover, I don't expect it to be perfectly fitting. The material seems sturdy enough and should last a long time. It's easy to wipe out the grease on the surface also.Another neat thing I like about this package is it came with a pair of side covers, which is super useful to me. It fits perfectly between my stove and the countertop.

reviews.reviewTitle: Waste of money. Threw it in the garbage
reviews.reviewText: It was ill fitting. Trying to cut so it fit properly was a huge waste of time

reviews.reviewTitle: Did not fit our LG stove
reviews.reviewText: Item seemed like good quality but unfortunately did not fit. Sent it back. Item was shipped quickly and came in good condition. Seller did a good job.

I really like this product. Easy to clean and I don't have to worry about having to pull my stove out to clean the sides every few months. Nothing falls down. It's easy to install and it looks good and it works. Great idea.

I love this product. Make sure you check the size of your burners and width, length of inside surface. I had to cut mine in half, but still works well. You will still have to clean the surface, but these liners catch the worst of this and wipes off so easily. I really don't have to clean my oven top as much as I used to, and the black looks really good. I titally recommend this product.
